article_title: IBM and The Weather Channel launch detailed local COVID-19 maps and data tracking
article_description: There are already a number of resources available for mapping the spread of confirmed COVID 19 cases both in the U S  and globally  but IBM and its subsidiary The Weather Company have launched new tools that bring COVID 19 mapping and analysis to more people
article_content: There are already a number of resources available for mapping the spread of confirmed COVID 19 cases both in the U S  and globally  but IBM and its subsidiary The Weather Company have launched new tools that bring COVID 19 mapping and analysis to more people    2093 chars
